personalInfo.name: DEVANSH
personalInfo.title: FULL STACK AND AI ENGINEER
personalInfo.description: Full-stack software engineer with 4+ years of experience in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and AI integration, delivering scalable solutions with 30%+ performance improvements. Expert in cloud-native systems and advanced Gen AI technologies.
personalInfo.subtitle: Building the future, one algorithm at a time.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate Full Stack and AI Engineer with 4+ years of experience in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and AI integration.
I specialize in delivering scalable solutions and have a proven track record of 30%+ performance improvements and 20% revenue growth for eCommerce and digital asset platforms.
Expert in cloud-native systems (AWS, Azure, Vercel) and advanced Gen AI technologies, I lead technical initiatives in cross-functional teams to deliver measurable business impact.

education.degree: M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
B.Tech in Computer Science and Information Technology

skills.name: Frontend Development
skills.description: React.js, Next.js, React Native, TypeScript, Redux, Material UI, Tailwind, Remix.

skills.name: Backend & Database
skills.description: Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, MongoDB, SQL, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, RabbitMQ.

skills.name: AI & NLP
skills.description: OpenAI GPT-Models, Chatbots, NLP, AI Integration, Prompt Engineering, LangChain.

skills.name: Cloud & DevOps
skills.description: AWS, Azure, Heroku, Vercel, Docker, Git, CI/CD.

projects.title: Buildacopilot
projects.subtitle: AI Agent Marketplace & Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive AI-powered platform with Agent Builder, Copilot Hub, and Prompt Hub. Enables users to create, share, and monetize AI agents with document processing and MCP integration.

projects.title: Dine Pulse
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Feedback Platform
projects.description: SaaS platform enabling restaurants to collect actionable customer feedback in under 60 seconds through AI-powered conversational interfaces. Integrates WhatsApp Business API and sentiment analysis.

projects.title: LocalLLMChat
projects.subtitle: On-Device AI Chat App
projects.description: Privacy-focused Android app running LLMs locally for offline chats. Implements RAG pipeline with local embeddings and vector search for complete data sovereignty.

experience.description: Developed and enhanced enterprise eCommerce solutions using Shopify and custom backend services. Resolved critical Remix + React SSR issues and led technical SEO optimization.
achievements: Contributed to 30% increase in user engagement and 20% revenue growth for D2C clients.
Resolved critical Remix + React SSR hydration issues, ensuring SEO-safe delivery.
Led technical SEO optimization resulting in 30%+ improvement in page speed.
Built and optimized features for in-house Gen AI platform, reducing token consumption by 20%.

experience.description: Created and delivered multiple generative AI projects. Led troubleshooting of system design issues and spearheaded PHP and SQL project development.
achievements: Delivered diverse GenAI functionalities enhancing automation and efficiency.
Resolved 30+ critical bugs within tight deadlines.
Supported 40% increase in user base with scalable PHP/SQL solutions.
Developed AI-powered PDF reader with 90% accuracy.

experience.description: Developed and optimized full-stack web applications using MERN stack. Engineered secure RESTful APIs and led responsive interface development.
achievements: Reduced web page load times by 30% and API calls by 15%.
Boosted web application speed by 25% using Next.js SSR/SSG.
Safeguarded user base of 50,000+ with JWT security.
Leveraged OpenAI GPT models for chatbot and translation tools.

contact.title: Let's Build the Future Together

contact.ctaDescription: Whether it's an AI project, web development, or consultation, I'm here to help bring your vision to life with cutting-edge technology.
